attributes.action: Make a Full and detailed public investigation into the social services as a whole to make sure there never is a repeat of the torture of children under this goverments care ever again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to make sure the relevent people are dismissed if there is in no doubt that they are responsible for the neglect of care in looking after or the protection of our children in the united kingdom

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
